author: makortel
body:
#### PR description:

This PR is part of #31061. It completes the EventSetup-consumes migration for bunch of DQM modules that were partly migrated earlier, but were causing failures in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/31746.

#### PR validation:

Code compiles, these modules do not trigger the exception of #31746 in a job using them.
title: Complete EventSetup-consumes migration for bunch of DQM modules
